title: Meditations on the Can; Finding Inner Peace on the Porcelain Throne
description: Meditation? Who's got time for it, right? You do! This simple guide will help you learn how easy it is to meditate and find the time and places to do it. If you're like most people—beings that eat food—you have to use the can a few times per day. If you don't, well, maybe you have other issues you need to address.Now that you have a time and place to seek inner peace, what else do you need: some easy and fast techniques. You don't want to be in there too long, people might start talking. Without further ado, dive into this life changing book, and get to business, the business of finding inner peace, I mean.
author: Thomas W. Harding
